remarks: Any word in a free monoid can be expressed as the sum of the singletons composing it.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Sep-2015.)
statement:
frmdmnd.m $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` I ) $.
frmdgsum.u $e |- U = ( varFMnd ` I ) $.
frmdgsum $p |- ( ( I e. V /\ W e. Word I ) -> ( M gsum ( U o. W ) ) = W ) $.
